p: The triple-helix β-glucans with high molecular weight show stronger anticancer properties [ 10, 15]. Mushroom glucans often form intermolecular interactions yielding complex polymers that are difficult to isolate, but recent studies suggest a simple and effective procedure that allows to separate different glucan structures. de Jesus et al. found that, linear 1-3-α- d-glucans are insoluble in diluted aqueous NaOH solutions, whereas 1,3-1,6-β- d-glucans are soluble [ 46].
